original_text: After they had gone a long time without food, Paul stood up before them and said: “Men, you should have taken my advice not to sail from Crete; then you would have spared yourselves this damage and loss.
korean_text: 여러 사람이 오래 먹지 못하였으매 바울이 가운데 서서 말하되 여러분이여 내 말을 듣고 그레데에서 떠나지 아니하여 이 타격과 손상을 면하였더라면 좋을 뻔하였느니라

sentences.original_text: After they had gone a long time without food
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 오랫동안 음식 없이 지낸 후에

sentences.original_text: Men, you should have taken my advice
then you would have spared yourselves
